DOC.brief_title: Carotid Artery Stenting With Cilostazol Addition Restenosis
DOC.detailed_description: Restenosis carotid artery stenting ( CAS ) critical issue . Cilostazol reduce restenosis intervention coronary femoropopliteal artery . The investigator confirm publish periprocedural cilostazol administration reduce incidence in-stent restenosis ( ISR ) target vessel revascularization ( TVR ) CAS , retrospectively . CAS-CARE study Multicenter Prospective Ranodomized Controlled Study . Patients , schedule CAS within 30 day , 50 % symptomatic carotid stenosis 80 % asymptomatic carotid stenosis , enroll randomize cilostazol/non-cilostazol group . 900 patient enrol 2 year follow 2 year in-stent restenosis CAS , evaluate carotid ultrasound angiography . And , evaluate cardiovascular event , include stroke , myocardial infarction , hemorrhagic event periprocedural period follow period . In study , ISR diagnose ultrasound DSA/CTA . Equivalence CTA ultrasound study .
